WWW.LIVEINHOST.COM - LOCATION FRANCE - New Plans! All on Performance SSD Storage!

WWW.LIVEINHOST.COM now offers VPS services in France.

===========================================================
LIVEINHOST VPS plans include:
- Premium 100% PURE SSD Servers for excellent disk I/O
- Include a security setup during provisioning
- Full root access
- Free setup 
- Custom Reverse DNS

===========================================================
NOCP 1 - NEW Price - $3 PER MONTH
===========================================================
- Disk Space = 30 GB (Pure SSD)
- Bandwidth = 1 TB
- RAM = 1 GB

NEW PRICE - $3 PER MONTH

ORDER NOW - https://liveinhost.com/cs/cart.php?pid=17&a=add&currency=1&billingcycle=monthly

===========================================================


We also offer cPanel control panel VPS and Hybrid VPS. Check the below URL for more details.
https://www.liveinhost.com/cpanel-vps/


Want to check our network speed? 
Here it is.

https://www.liveinhost.com/speedtest/10MB.img
https://www.liveinhost.com/speedtest/100MB.img
https://www.liveinhost.com/speedtest/1GB.img


Q: What port speeds are included with the VPS?
A: 100Mbps port speeds for the VPSs. All nodes have 100mbps or 1gbps ports.


Q: What is your average setup time?
A: We average 2 hour setup time currently.


Q: How long have you been in business?
A: Since 2015. Yes, we are new in bussiness.


Q: Do you allow proxy sites?
A: We allow private proxy sites. We do not permit public proxy sites.


Q: Do you make backups of all VPSs?
A: Yes, with Liveihost Protect Service we maintain backups. We do, however, always recommend keeping your own backups in addition to ours.


Q: Is there an additional fee for cPanel?
A: The packages which list cPanel the title include the license for the control panel.


Q: Can you assist transferring our existing data?
A: In most cases we can transfer your existing data in a cPanel server from another provider for free.



cPanel and No control panel VPS at location France.

http://www.liveinhost.com
